title: How to Upload and Share a Spreadsheet on Google Docs

steps.title: Before anything else, prepare your spreadsheet file and place it in a folder which you can easily find.
steps.content: Before anything else, prepare your spreadsheet file and place it in a folder which you can easily find.

steps.title: Start by opening your Gmail account and clicking on 'Drive' which is found at the left-topmost part of your screen.
steps.content: Start by opening your Gmail account and clicking on 'Drive' which is found at the left-topmost part of your screen. You will be redirected to https://docs.google.com/

steps.title: Before making any upload make sure that the 'Upload Settings' are set correctly.
steps.content: Before making any upload make sure that the 'Upload Settings' are set correctly. To do this click on the 'gear icon'->upload settings->'Convert uploaded files to google docs format'.

steps.title: Drag your mouse down a little until you find a button that says 'Upload'
steps.content: Drag your mouse down a little until you find a button that says 'Upload'

steps.title: Click Upload and a small pop menu appears containing two upload types, may it be "Files" or "Folders".
steps.content: Click Upload and a small pop menu appears containing two upload types, may it be "Files" or "Folders".

steps.title: Select your file and click 'Open' on the pop-up box.
steps.content: Select your file and click 'Open' on the pop-up box.

steps.title: After the file has been uploaded a 'Share' link will appear.
steps.content: After the file has been uploaded a 'Share' link will appear.

steps.title: Click the 'Share' link to invite friends or colleagues.
steps.content: Click the 'Share' link to invite friends or colleagues.

steps.title: Type in the email address of your friends or colleagues.
steps.content: Type in the email address of your friends or colleagues.

steps.title: Set the access type of the recently added email, choose from "can edit", "Can Comment" and "Can View".
steps.content: Set the access type of the recently added email, choose from "can edit", "Can Comment" and "Can View". click on Done.

steps.title: After clicking "Done", you will then see your uploaded spreadsheet marked with "Shared".
steps.content: After clicking "Done", you will then see your uploaded spreadsheet marked with "Shared".

steps.title: You're Spreadsheet must be set to be opened on "Google Sheet" so that you can edit it on a spreadsheet manner.
steps.content: You're Spreadsheet must be set to be opened on "Google Sheet" so that you can edit it on a spreadsheet manner. To set it, Right click on the file, select "Open with->Google Sheets".

steps.title: Now you can open and edit your Spreadsheet just like Excel and so as your friend as collaborators.
steps.content: Now you can open and edit your Spreadsheet just like Excel and so as your friend as collaborators.
